javascript:(function(e){function t(e){return["DIV","SPAN"].includes(e.tagName)}var r={elem(t){(function(t){for(let r of e.ignore?.selector??[])if(t.matches(r))return!0;for(let r of e.ignore?.func??[])if(r(t))return!0;return!1})(t)||(t.remove(),n.add(t))},list(e){Array.from(e).forEach((e=>r.elem(e)))},cls(e){r.list(document.getElementsByClassName(e))},selector(e){r.list(document.querySelectorAll(e))},func({func:e,selector:t=null}){let n=null==t?document.getElementsByClassName("*"):document.querySelectorAll(t);for(let t of n)e(t)&&r.elem(t)}},n=new Set,o=new Set;for(let[t,n]of Object.entries(e))if("ignore"!=t)for(let e of n)r[t](e);for(let e of n){if(o.has(e))continue;o.add(e);let n=e.parentElement;n.isConnected&&t(n)&&(n.hasChildNodes()||r.elem(n))}})({cls:["adsbygoogle","mod_ad_container","brn-ads-box","gpt-ad","ad-box","top-ads-container","adthrive-ad"],selector:['[aria-label="advertisement"]','[class*="-ad "], [class*="-ad-"], [class$="-ad"], [class^="ad-"], [class^="adthrive"]',':is(div,iframe)[id^="google_ads_iframe_"]',"#aipPrerollContainer"],func:[{selector:'[class*="ad"],[id*="ad"]',func(e){for(const t of[e.id,...e.classList])if(/(?<!lo|re|he)ad(vertisement)?s?(thrive)?(content)?(engine|ngin)?(container)?s?($|[-_,\s])/.test(t))return!0}},{selector:"div#preroll",func(e){for(let t of e.children)if(t.matches("div#aipBranding"))return!0}}],ignore:{selector:["body",".ad-layout","#game-holder.game-holder-with-ad"],func:[e=>{let t=document.getElementsByTagName("article");for(let r of t)if(e.contains(r))return!0}]}});
